text: Ɲama naxan keli konyiya Perise bɔxi ma, nee naxa sɛrɛxɛ gan daaxi ba Isirayila Marigi Ala bɛ. Na findi tuura fu nun firin nan na Isirayila bɔnsɔɛ birin bɛ, nun yɛxɛɛ kontonyi tongo solomanaani nun senni, yɛxɛɛ tongo solofere nun solofere, nun sikɔtɛ fu nun firin. Na findi yunubi xafari sɛrɛxɛ nan na a gan daaxi.
